user_stories.title: Access to Knowledge Base
user_stories.description: As a care staff member, I want to quickly access the knowledge base to find care guidelines, HR policies, and procedures, so that I can provide consistent and compliant care to residents without delay.

user_stories.title: Instant Responses to Routine Queries
user_stories.description: As a care staff member, I want to use an AI chatbot to get immediate answers to routine questions about policies or procedures, so that I can save time and reduce disruptions in my workflow.

user_stories.title: IT Issue Resolution
user_stories.description: As a care staff member, I want the iSPOC system to assist with basic IT issues (like password resets) directly through the chatbot, so that I can resolve technical issues quickly without waiting for IT intervention.

user_stories.title: Policy Clarification
user_stories.description: As a care staff member, I want iSPOC to provide clear, plain-language explanations of complex policies, so that I can easily understand compliance requirements and avoid policy violations.

user_stories.title: Compliance Alerts
user_stories.description: As a care staff member, I want to receive alerts if my actions are at risk of violating a policy, so that I can take corrective actions immediately and avoid compliance issues.

user_stories.title: Quick Policy Access and Role-Specific Guidance
user_stories.description: As an admin or care home manager, I want quick access to specific policy details and any implications for my role, so that I can ensure staff compliance and provide accurate support to care assistants and ancillary colleagues.

user_stories.title: On-Behalf Query Submission
user_stories.description: As an admin or care home manager, I want to submit questions or issues on behalf of care assistants, so I can streamline their workflow and handle their concerns efficiently.

user_stories.title: Digital Tool Access Support
user_stories.description: As an admin manager, I want easy access to support for logging into digital tools, so I can assist care staff with accessing digital support plans and other essential systems.

user_stories.title: Knowledge Base Management
user_stories.description: As an HR or policy team member, I want to update the knowledge base with new or revised policies, so that staff have access to the latest guidelines and procedures.

user_stories.title: Trend Analysis for Training Needs
user_stories.description: As an HR team member, I want access to data showing common staff queries and knowledge gaps, so that I can identify areas where staff need further training or support.

user_stories.title: Ticket Generation and Escalation
user_stories.description: As an IT support staff member, I want iSPOC to automatically create a ticket and escalate complex technical issues that can’t be resolved by the chatbot, so that I can focus on specialized cases and ensure timely resolution.

user_stories.title: Automated Tracking of Issue Resolution
user_stories.description: As an IT support staff member, I want the system to track the status of tickets and automatically update staff about their resolution status, so that I can maintain transparency without manually following up with each case.

user_stories.title: System Maintenance and Analytics
user_stories.description: As an IT team member, I want access to analytics on response times and issue types, so that I can monitor system performance, address recurring technical problems, and plan resources accordingly.

user_stories.title: Monitoring Resource Utilization
user_stories.description: As a manager, I want iSPOC to highlight trends in staff inquiries and resource usage, so that I can allocate resources effectively and identify potential areas for improvement in staff support.

user_stories.title: Access to Compliance and Policy Usage Data
user_stories.description: As a compliance officer or manager, I want to see data on policy access, compliance alerts, and staff interactions with the knowledge base, so that I can assess policy adherence and ensure compliance requirements are met across the organization.

user_stories.title: Identifying Training Gaps
user_stories.description: As a manager, I want iSPOC to provide analytics on frequently asked questions and common staff issues, so that I can identify training gaps and proactively address them with targeted training programs.

user_stories.title: Evaluating Staff Support Satisfaction
user_stories.description: As a manager, I want to access reports on staff satisfaction with iSPOC responses and issue resolutions, so that I can ensure the system meets staff needs and implement improvements based on feedback.

user_stories.title: Targeted Training Recommendations
user_stories.description: As a training coordinator, I want iSPOC to analyze query trends and suggest relevant training modules for common issues, so that I can provide targeted training to improve staff knowledge in specific areas.

user_stories.title: Self-Service Training Modules Access
user_stories.description: As a training coordinator, I want staff to have access to self-service training modules linked directly to iSPOC responses, so that they can immediately address any knowledge gaps without waiting for formal training sessions.

user_stories.title: Feedback on Training Effectiveness
user_stories.description: As a training coordinator, I want to receive feedback on staff interactions with training modules and completion rates, so that I can evaluate the effectiveness of training resources and adjust them as needed.

user_stories.title: Monitoring Policy Compliance Alerts
user_stories.description: As a compliance team member, I want to be notified of compliance deviations flagged by iSPOC, so that I can investigate and ensure corrective actions are taken.

user_stories.title: Regular Policy Updates
user_stories.description: As a compliance team member, I want to ensure all policies in the knowledge base are up-to-date and accurately interpreted in plain language, so that staff can easily understand and adhere to compliance requirements.

user_stories.title: Policy Consolidation and Standardization
user_stories.description: As a policy team member, I want to consolidate and standardize policies into a consistent format to streamline the chatbot's access and response accuracy.

user_stories.title: Policy Relationship Mapping
user_stories.description: As a policy team member, I want iSPOC to help staff understand the relationships between different policies, so that they can better navigate complex policy implications relevant to their roles.

user_stories.title: Quick Reference for HR Questions
user_stories.description: As a general staff member, I want quick answers to common HR questions, such as leave entitlements, so I don’t need to wait for HR responses.
